item.title: QEMU virtual machine for kernel testing
item.description: Few notes and command dump about creating QEMU virtual machine for testing various kernel features.

item.title: Multipath Wi-Fi bridging with transparent MPTCP proxy on LEDE
item.description: How to setup a transparent, site-to-site MPTCP proxy with LEDE. Detailed tutorial and description of my Google Summer of Code 2017 project.
